Name: White Christmas
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: As the name suggests, this is a Christmassy riff on a White Russian cocktail – the festive feel courtesy of mincemeat and gingerbread syrup.
History: Created in December 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
